column1: - there is no VSK option for Twin PIN
- there is no TWIN PIN option for detachable towbars, as can't fit
- 7 PIN will only match with 7 PIN VSK
- 13 PIN will only match with 13 PIN VSK
- the pick up 5m cable only applies to universal wiring
